text: Unuoi Va`enuku (born 5 April 1976) is a Tongan former rugby union player. He played as centre. ==Career== Va`enuku debuted for Tonga during the 1995 Rugby World Cup, playing all the three pool stage matches, being his first cap against France in Pretoria. His last cap for Tonga was during the third pool stage match against Ivory Coast in Rustenburg. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Tongan rugby union players Category:Rugby union centres Category:Tonga international rugby union players
title: Unuoi Vaʻenuku
